message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a great price of $230. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
That's a bit higher than I was hoping to pay. I'd be willing to consider a price of $120.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob.  While I can't go as low as $120, I'm willing to come down to $180.  I believe this product will truly benefit you, and I want to make it a fair offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $180 is still a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to consider a price of $100.
